text: Tadeusz Dembonczyk (23 December 1955 - 11 February 2004) was a Polish weightlifter. He won the Bronze medal 56 kg in the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow. He was awarded the Bronze after he tied with Andreas Letz after both lifted 265 kg in total and they had weighted 55.6 kg before the competition and were reweighed and Dembonczyk was awarded the bronze. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Olympic weightlifters of Poland Category:Weightlifters at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tarnowskie Góry Category:Polish male weightlifters
title: Tadeusz Dembończyk
